title: Pset_UtilityConsumptionPHistory
description: Consumption of utility resources, typically applied to the IfcBuilding instance, used to identify how much was consumed on I.e., a monthly basis.

Heat.title: Heat
Heat.description: The amount of heat energy consumed during the period specified in the time series.

Electricity.title: Electricity
Electricity.description: The amount of electricity consumed during the period specified in the time series.

Water.title: Water
Water.description: The amount of water consumed during the period specified in the time series.

Fuel.title: Fuel
Fuel.description: The amount of fuel consumed during the period specified in the time series.

Steam.title: Steam
Steam.description: The amount of steam consumed during the period specified in the time series.
